Which mock framework, if any, are you using? Can you post an example?

S.


On 9 Sep 2008, at 13:00, pmcevoy12 wrote:
> Hi,
>
> Are there any changes between 4.4 and 4.5 in regards to Mock objects?
>
> I am updating at work and I am seeing some tests that use mock objects
> pass in 4.4 and now fail in 4.5.  In one case I found that a class
> that had one method mocked was using the real method in 4.4 (which
> seems wrong) and was using the mocked method in 4.5 (which seems  
> right).
>
> That is, it seems as if a bug was fixed from 4.4 to 4.5.
>
> I fixed that one test of ours and now I am looking at a few others for
> similar situations.  I am mostly just curious.  Thanks.
>
> --- Patrick
>

Steve Freeman
